rescuecore2.standard.components

Class StandardAgent<E extends StandardEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.components.AbstractComponent<T>
      • rescuecore2.components.AbstractAgent<StandardWorldModel,E>
        • rescuecore2.standard.components.StandardAgent<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The subclass of StandardEntity that this agent wants to control.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSampleAgent, ControlledAmbulanceTeam, ControlledFireBrigade, ControlledPoliceForce, DummyAgent, SampleCentre

    public abstract class StandardAgent<E extends StandardEntity>
extends AbstractAgent<StandardWorldModel,E>
    Abstract base class for standard agents.
